rdf:Description.dc:title: Agricultural societies newsletter 1986
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Farm Development Division.
Alberta. Engineering and Rural Services Division.
Alberta. Rural Services Division.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, Alta. : Alberta Agriculture, Farm Development Division.
rdf:Description.dc:description: December issues from 1983-1985,1987-1988 & 1990-1992 have a one-page Christmas staff greeting stapled on cover (with either a re-worked version of a well-known Christmas verse or personal messages from Alberta Agriculture staff).
Issue for Sept./Oct. 1980 misnumbered as: Vol. 5, no. 8.
Volume and issue numbering (starting with vol. 1, no. 1) commences with June 1981 issue and ceases with vol. 4, no. 4 (July 1983).
Issues for 1981 are numbered: Vol. 1, no. 1 (June 1981), vol. 2, no. 2 (Sept. 1981), and vol. 2, no. 3 (Oct. 1981).
Issues for July, August and September 1981 combined into: Vol. 2, no. 2 (Sept. 1981).
Some issues lack month and year designation.
Issued 1977? by the Farm Development Division; 1980-Aug.1986 by Engineering and Rural Services Division; Oct.1986-199? by Rural Services Division.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Agriculture
